name: Red Rider Air Rifle
rules: Long-Range;This weapon enters play with two eye counters.;This weapon has +2 ATK for each eye counter on it.;When you strike with a weapon, reveal the top card of your deck.;If it has an odd cost, remove an eye counter from this weapon.

name: Kwee Q. Peddlefeet
rules: Long-Range;When this ally deals combat damage to an ally while attacking, gain control of that ally while this ally remains under your control.

name: Krazal the Eggregator
rules: When this ally is revealed from your deck, put a 1 [NATURE] / 1 [HEALTH] Spring rabbit ally token into play.

name: Searing Scorchling
rules: Ferocity;When this ally is destroyed, it may deal 2 fire damage to target hero.

name: Swift Brewfest Ram
rules: When you place a resource face up, choose one at random. Each player draws a card, or each player discards a card.;(Mounts can't attack or be attacked.)

name: The Horseman's Horrific Helm
rules: If this armor would prevent damage, you may laugh a scary laugh. If you do, this armor prevents all that damage instead.
flavour: Horseman rise... Your time is nigh... You felt death once... Now, know demise!
